name: Christine Begle
text: I've never actually eaten food from here, but as a Door Dasher, I pick up from here a lot. The staff are super friendly and helpful and take pride in their work. Today they actually wrapped the lettuce for a sub separately so it didn't get â€¦More

name: Fur Immer
text: This one usually has pretty good food. Let's start with this location is about 5 minutes from me and im out of their delivery zone for whatever reason so I have to go through door dash. And last night I had ordered pizza and it took a while â€¦More

name: Lyndy VanEenoo
text: We put in an order for pickup at 5:15 to be finished at 6:00. Told it was going to be 5 minutes when we got there, actually took 20 minutes past our scheduled pickup time. Pizza was good as most Hungry Howies are, but the long wait time was a bummer.

name: Stacie Mullen
text: This location is never open when i get off work at 8pm id love to actually get to order some pizza from here but never can. 8pm is a bit early for a pizza place to be closing no matter what

name: Thomas Crumbaugh
text:
*Friendly Staff *Delicious Pizza *Great Value
This was my first time at this location and I'm very pleased with the pizza and the friendliness of the staff and I would definitely recommend this location to â€¦More

name: Natasha Black
text: Super friendly staff! Food is the bomb! Thanks guys ðŸ’™

name: Zachary Lesniak
text: This is an excellent Hungry Howie's. EVERYONE should order from here because the staff and food are spectacular! Everyone was really nice and really polite. I love their food, and this location is really reliable.

name: Matthew Vansickle
text: Great spot to grab quick lunch. They have some good lunch specials with options to keep it interesting. They have a nice small lobby with seating to eat before heading back to work.  A bathroom is available.

name: Donald Stevens
text: They always seem happy to have you there. Don't get that feeling much, anymore. Tasty too!

name: James Walsh
text: I live in Georgia and was visiting Michigan and thought I would eat some Hungry Howieâ€™s pizza because I remembered it being one of my favorite things (We donâ€™t have Hungry Howieâ€™s in Georgia as far as I know of). Anyway, I call the number â€¦More

name: varis panchbhaiya
text: I went in expecting just an OK pizza just to fill me up (after being at work for 4 hours). What I got was a very tasty and satisfying small pizza with 2 toppings, just for $5. I never knew this thing existed. Last time I had a $5 pizza was â€¦More

name: Taneil Detzler
text: Tasty pizza, always have a great experience!

name: Pancerny
text: Love their pizza but the boneless wings were very disapointing.

name: Amber Me
text: Was a 1 star from an order this morning but thanks to steve making a bad situation right in every way possible. Our order took 2 hours due to a situation at the store was not contacted at first but like I said the manager steve contacted me â€¦More

name: Curious Cancer
text: First time trying a calzone...amazing

name: Shirese Powell
text: Food here is much tastier than other locations. The staff is very courteous and professional and they prepare the food in a timely manner. This is my favorite Hungry Howie's location thus far.

name: aju86
text: This hungry howies in Novi area Is great! There's a dining area and a public bathroom, both of which are very uncommon for  howies. The guy at the counter wad super friendly and very helpful (dont remember his name) he made sure i was happy â€¦More

name: Sean Allan
text: Great pizza and friendly staff! Had a issue with pizza i messed up the order on and the manager fixed it right away and it was my fault not theirs customer for life!

name: Johnny B
text: The pizza looked great, and tasted amazing.  The guys working were very friendly.  Thank you!

name: Fn K
text: So clean and fast service dont waste your mony on other pizza place

name: gayle tremblay
text: Went in on my lunch break and ordered the 2 Howie rolls. Sat and waited for them, got back to work and ate about half of one and realized the inside of the dough was completely raw. Took it back for a refund, no apology or anything. Zach â€¦More

name: Amit Bhatnagar
text: On busy Friday evening, we ordered 5 topping Vegetarian Pizza with Garlic bread. It was busy, the lady to take our order was new, but we and she both completed the order patiently. We were asked if we want our Pizza crust garlic and we â€¦More

name: Daniel Gualdoni
text: Good pizza! Nice people

name: Pete Watson
text: tasty food & very good staff. Gave me a free drink because my order took longer than expected!

name: Ian Twiggs
text: I received excellent and extremely quick service!!

name: Arjun Vashi
text: This place extremely disrespectful. I went in to get a job and the manager (Sean) gave me a huge packet to fill out with all my SS, insurance, birth certificate etc. He then told me I got the job and they will call on Monday with my â€¦More

name: Michael jenks
text: They are under new ownership, these guys are much better than the last, thanks for the great service and amazing pizza. Its a great fealing when  i walk in there door and a smiling face is rushing to take care my order. Very impressed, ill be back.

name: Tanya Fielhauer
text: Spoke Zach the alleged manager after waiting an hour and half for my delivery order.  I was told that because the driver couldn't find our place and that it was my fault I didn't answer my phone when they called.  MY FAULT?! My fault that â€¦More

name: Sean Peterson
text: As of last Thursday, this location has acquired new owners, new managers, and an awesome staff. I recommend that anyone and everyone to come try this location out. If you have had a bad experience at this location I suggest you guys give â€¦More

name: gerald mcleod
text: Pizza and breadsticks very good.

name: Chico Seductive
text: She was the best delivery driver I ever met. She need a raise. I think her name is Nicole. She nice and highly respectful.

name: Mark Rager
text: Quick and good pizza

name: Sarah Whittaker
text: We ordered online and had an estimated 40 minute delivery wait. It was only about 25/30 minutes. The pizza and cheesey bread were still super hot, and it was delicious! The price was fair and the food was great. We don't call out for pizza â€¦More

name: David Plait
text: Not sure what was better the 3 cheese bread or the deep dish pie....yum !! Driver was awesome. We will go back

name: Trevor Accorsi
text: Roses are red Violets are blue you guys suck real hairy nut sacks...I am seriously pissed! Screw my order up, promise me to refund my money then when time comes to refund and replace my order the hamster fell off the wheels! NOOOOOO refund â€¦More

text: Worst service ever, literally. RUDE workers, its unbelievable. And their food isn't even worth it.

text: Good pizza! Online ordering is very convenient

name: jessie susan
text: Worst ever pizza. They don't follow the instructions properly. Cleanliness is 0%. Do not even dare to get a pizza from here

name: Jacob Peterson
text: I went to pizza hut down the road where service was SO terrible i had to leave. Luckily Hungry Howies was just down the road, and had supperior pizza ready in a fraction of the time!

name: Howlzuzu GlÃ¤nz
text: It was really good. Had to wait a couple mintues after the quoted 15 mintues vut was totally worth it! Yum!

name: Joseph Spain
text: Horrible service and horrible food. It's a double whammy. Food did not tease good and they took hour and 25 mins to deliver. It was a Wednesday afternoon. Will not be ordering from this location ever again.

name: Michelle W
text: The delivery here sucks. It's been about 1+ hour and our 2 pizzas have still not come. The lady I called 2 times to check on my order was nice and calm, but I'm very disappointed since it was for a party and half the people have already left.

name: Edward June
text: Pulled up to get food and delivery driver in white ford was shooting up, what probably was heroin. Never stop to eat there again.

text: Great customer service even right when they open

text: Shut this place down. I waited almost two hours and then the driver refused to leave her car and was honking at us. Shut this pathetic place down. Garbage

text: Made it right.

name: chris ohlert
text: This place is horrible!  Just ordered pizza and by the time it actually got here it was cold as ice and over cooked. I called and spoke to the manager, " supposedly " and their excuse was that their driver had 3 orders in front of mine and â€¦More

text: The pizzas are very tasty!! I recommend them to all

This isn't the first time this has happened either. Any food from here is either burnt or takes forever. Horrible expirence and never ordering from here again.
